name: biomni-predict-admet-properties
title: Biomni: Predict ADMET Properties
description: Predicts ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, Toxicity) properties for a list of compounds
content:
Overview

Predicts ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, Toxicity) properties for compounds using machine learning models. Assesses drug-likeness, pharmacokinetic parameters, and potential toxicity liabilities early in drug discovery.

Input Parameters

  • smiles_list (required): List of compound SMILES strings to evaluate
  • ADMET_model_type (optional): Model architecture for predictions (default: 'MPNN' - Message Passing Neural Network)

Biological Use Case

Fundamental for early-stage drug discovery to filter out compounds with poor pharmacokinetic properties or toxicity risks. Predicts oral bioavailability, blood-brain barrier permeability, CYP450 inhibition, hERG liability, hepatotoxicity, and other critical ADMET endpoints. Reduces attrition rates and accelerates lead optimization by identifying liabilities before costly synthesis and testing.

Output

Comprehensive ADMET predictions including absorption (Caco-2, HIA), distribution (VDss, PPB), metabolism (CYP interactions), excretion (clearance), and toxicity (hERG, hepatotoxicity) saved to admet_properties_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
